contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox company | company_name = Atea | company_logo = <gallery> File:Atea.png|Atea </gallery> | caption = | company_type = [[Public company|Public]] | traded_as = | foundation = 1968 | location = [[Oslo]], [[Norway]] | key_people = Claus Hougesen <small>([[Chief executive officer|CEO]])</small> | industry = IT infrastructure solutions | products = | revenue = {{NOK|17.1 billion|link=yes}} <small>(FY 2010)</small> | operating_income = | net_income = | owner = | num_employees = 5500 | parent = | homepage = [http://www.atea.com/ www.atea.com] }} '''Atea''' ({{ose|ATEA}}), previously '''Ementor''', is a [[Nordic countries|Nordic]] [[information technology|IT]] infrastructure solutions and services company. It is headquartered in [[Oslo]], [[Norway]]. The company sells, installs, and supports products from [[Citrix]], [[VMware]], [[Apple Inc.|Apple]], [[Cisco Systems, Inc.|Cisco]], [[Hewlett-Packard|HP]], [[Microsoft]], [[Lenovo]], [[IBM]] and others. As of October 2010, the company employs about 4,700 people and operates in 73 cities in Norway, Sweden, Denmark, Finland, Lithuania, Latvia and Estonia. From January 1, 2009, the company was named Atea.<ref>{{cite web | url=http://www.ementor.no/templates/PressRelease.aspx?id=18843 | title=Ementor-gruppen endrer navn til Atea | publisher=[[Google Patents]] | accessdate=2008-10-21 }}</ref> 22 December 2009 Atea AS acquired the Norwegian company, Uni. Uni is specialized in the delivery of wireless and wired infrastructure, as well as modern and environmentally friendly computer lab.<ref>[http://atea.no/no-Main-menu/Nyheter/Nyheter-2009/Atea-kjoper-Uni-Networks-i-Norge/], atea.no, Retrieved 2010-01-30</ref> == References == {{reflist}} <references/> == External links == * [http://www.atea.com/ Official site] {{DEFAULTSORT:Atea (Company)}} [[Category:Computer companies of Norway]] {{service-company-stub}} {{ict-company-stub}} {{Norway-company-stub}}
